name: Yugi Mutto First Deck
desc: In this project I had to create a page that shows to the users all cards that were in a JSON file using JavaScript, CSS and HTML.

name: Handcrafted Haven Project
desc: Handcrafted Haven is an online store for handcrafted items, built with Next.js, React, and Tailwind CSS. Users can purchase products from different sellers, with all information and purchases managed using a MongoDB database.

name: ARTZY Design
desc: Artzy is my first project based on a webpage that is offering webpages to the user. Created with HTML and CSS.
